string-array.item: La Fortuna de San Carlos, Kosta Rika

string-array.name: desc
string-array.item: At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. All guest rooms at Hotel Stari grad include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property.There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property is 45 km from Vlasic, while Banja Luka is 71 km away.

The holiday home is located on the ground floor and has 2 bedrooms, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a fully equipped kitchen that provides guests with a dishwasher, a fridge, a washing machine, an oven and a stovetop.

All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy a selection of traditional Bosnian and international cuisine in the in-house restaurant.There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property is 45 km from Vlasic, while Banja Luka is 71 km away.

Motel Plaza features a restaurant, free bikes, a bar and shared lounge in Jajce. With a garden, the 3-star motel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a 24-hour front desk.

All units at the motel are equipped with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. All guest rooms include a wardrobe.There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property is 45 km from Vlasic, while Banja Luka is 71 km away.

Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Turist 98 offers accommodation in Jajce. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site.There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property is 45 km from Vlasic, while Banja Luka is 71 km away.

Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a bathroom that includes a hairdryer.There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The property is 45 km from Vlasic, while Banja Luka is 71 km away.
